Class YafConfig

java.lang.Object
com.coherentsolutions.yaf.core.config.YafConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppConfig
@ComponentScan(basePackages="com.coherentsolutions", includeFilters=) @EnableCaching @EnableAsync @EnableAutoConfiguration @EnableAspectJAutoProxy @EnableScheduling @Order @EnableConfigurationProperties(ApiPropertiesHolder.class) public class YafConfig extends Object implements AppConfig
